Pre-Game Insights: India has a 10-match winning streak in T20Is, the best ever except for twice by Afghanistan
The absences of Virat Kohli, Rishabh Pant, Deepak Chahar, and Suryakumar Yadav provide opportunities for other players
Sri Lanka is struggling due to injuries, with Wanindu Hasaranga missing due to Covid-19
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match will be played at Himachal Pradesh Cricket Association Stadium, Dharamsala
The temperature could drop to as low as 6Â°C during the game
There is also the likelihood of rain during the game
Others: India's probable playing XI: Rohit Sharma (C), Ishan Kishan (WK), Shreyas Iyer, Sanju Samson, Venkatesh Iyer, Ravindra Jadeja, Deepak Hooda, Harshal Patel, Bhuvneshwar Kumar, Jasprit Bumrah, Yuzvendra Chahal

Sri Lanka's probable playing XI: Pathum Nissanka, Danushka Gunathilaka, Charith Asalanka, Janith Liyanage, Dinesh Chandimal (WK), Dasun Shanaka (C), Chamika Karunaratne, Dushmantha Chameera, Praveen Jayawickrama, Jeffrey Vandersay, Lahiru Kumara
India won the first T20I by 62 runs
The head-to-head record shows that India has won 15 matches, Sri Lanka has won 7, and there has been 1 tie/no result
